description: This is a JavaScript source file defining a custom UI component 'NoteEditor' using the Blits component framework. It includes component props, template layout with elements and bindings, state management, computed properties for display, public methods for getting/setting content, and input event handlers for editing functionality.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A custom UI component for editing and saving notes, with a title and content area, built using Lightning's Blits framework.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Emit a save event with the current title and content.

methods.name: $save
methods.description: Private wrapper method to invoke save, used in template binding.
